MS MCQs

    Manage your SharePoint sites - Summary and knowledge check

    »

    1. To enable users to share files with guests, you must:

      Enable guest sharing for Microsoft 365 Groups and SharePoint.

      Enable guest sharing in SharePoint at both the organization and site level.

      Enable access requests for the SharePoint site where the content resides.


    2. Which security tools are available from the SharePoint admin center?

      Controls for unmanaged devices and inactive users

      Controls for sensitivity labels and sensitive content watermarking

      Controls for quarantining malicious files uploaded to SharePoint sites


    3. What kind of site permissions can the SharePoint administrator manage in the admin center?

      Microsoft 365 Group owner and primary administrator

      Site members and visitors

      Site permission levels, including Full Control, Edit, and Contribute
